Reviews.Content: 3 days spend dubai able fly home afghanistan id read islamic rules able hold hands wife public kissing cheek infestation hookers hotel bit shock feeling ill night couldnt sleep thump thump thump disco 1st floor 4th didnt help im incoming rocket attacks wasnt bad anyway hadnt stiff drink didnt hotels drinks watereddown 7 months id drink hotel bar ground floor drink asian woman admittedly pretty instantly looked immediately wasnt looks ignored ample breasts displayed peacock venerable sea wobbly flesh received watery screwdriver walked hooker sticking couldnt shake found single seat planted smile stuck look im feeling drink help sleep dont company ok left wasnt minute hooker pretty offered services sent comes sent sent hooker looked straight wwii propaganda cartoon complete crazy glasses mean bar closed girl mad told wasnt feeling id drink alright oh stay hotel sorry hotel alright money centrally located staff friendly indian resturant nice included breakfast nice offered eggs bacon indian food breakfast recommend staying youre budget stay bar night club dont hooker bring ear plugs youre light sleeper youre helicopters incoming rocket impacts youll fine
